// Nav.js import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; function Nav() { // Function to handle link clicks const handleLinkClick = (event) => { // Remove the "active" class from all nav links const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll(".nav-menu-item"); navLinks.forEach((link) => { link.classList.remove("active"); }); // Add the "active" class to the clicked link event.target.classList.add("active"); }; return (
  • Formations
  • Experiences
  • Projects
  • Certifications
  • Contact
); } export default Nav;
